Articles.Content:
I am a newbie to the game and find it very hard to remember the controls so if you could go onto KSP website and find a book that explains everything then yay 

 

 

Don't know if you can do this so don't rage at me please

Welcome aboard. Print this if you need to...

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings
KSP now has KSPedia right in game.

A book is actually a good suggestion IMO. Minecraft had a handbook. Lots of games have strategy guides. Whenever the game is finished and they actually start polish, that would be a very cool companion. They could even leave some blank pages in it for people to write down whatever they need at a given time.
